TASK_403_EMPTY_ID.message: Task id can not be empty!

TASK_403_EMPTY_IDS.message: Task ids can not be empty!

TASK_403_EMPTY_NAME.message: Task name can not be empty!

TASK_403_EMPTY_INDEX.message: Task index can not be empty!

TASK_403_EMPTY_USER_ID.message: Task user id can not be empty!

TASK_403_EMPTY_EVENT_ID.message: Task event id can not be empty!

TASK_403_EMPTY_STATUS_STR.message: Task status string can not be empty!

TASK_403_INVALID_EVENT.message: All tasks must be in same event!

TASK_403_INVALID_INDEX.message: Invalid value for task index. Required `number`!

TASK_403_INVALID_INDEX_0.message: Invalid value. 0 is not a valid index!

TASK_403_INVALID_INDEX_COUNT.message: Invalid no of tasks. Given task count does not match with the existing task count!

TASK_403_INVALID_INDEX_HIGH.message: Invalid value. Task index can not exceed the task count!

TASK_403_INVALID_INDEX_GAP.message: Invalid value for task indexes. Task indexes must not have gaps!

TASK_403_INVALID_STATUS.message: Invalid value for task status. required `boolean`!

TASK_403_INVALID_STATUS_STR.message: Invalid value for task status string.

TASK_404_ID.message: Can not find a task with id!

TASK_404_IDS.message: Can not find any tasks with ids!

TASK_404_EVENT_ID.message: Can not find any task with event id!

TASK_500_UPDATE_INDEX.message: Error occurred while updating task indexes!

TASK_500_UPDATE_STATUS.message: Error occurred while updating task status!
